span.p:
BMP280 Adafruit
Temperature · Pressure
I2C : SCK=GPIO22 · SDI=GPIO21

div.style: color: rgb(255, 179, 209) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Speaker V2 MonkMakes
Audio Speaker
LINE=GPIO27

span.p:
Voltage Divider
R1 : 330 Ohm in series
R2 : 470 Ohm to GND
Signal attenuated 5V to 3.3V
Output to GPIO18
